name: Inquiry (RSand18)
description:
This short narrative project in Unity is an experiment I wanted to do for my scripting class.

In the game, you play as a person who had recently been in a car accident and is now stranded in the middle of the forest with no one to help. Your only real option is to explore the nearby house on the hill and escape the stormy weather.

Upon arrival, you see the place entirely deserted, and have to piece together what happened to the owner of the house while finding help of your own.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint
